title: MAINIO CASTER CHAIR
description: The versatile Mainio Caster Chair will have you dining or meeting in more comfort and style than ever before. Fully upholstered in leather, this seat steals the show, and rightfully so. Its unique design provides padded, wraparound support with slim, curved arms and slightly tilted backrest, finished with casters, instead of fixed legs. From dining space to conference room, this mobile seat makes coming to the table easy and enjoyable.

title: CangLong CHAIR
description: These modern chairs are upholstered with high density sponge inside to offer high degree of comfort for sedentary sitting, they also have fully padded cushion seats with a plush velvet upholstery that boosts comfort and soft. They fit and work beside most dining tables in living room or contemporary-themed countertops in kitchens.

title: WAU DESK CHAIR
description: The Wau Desk Chair makes a stylish addition to any office combining ergonomics and ingenuity to bring you ultimate comfort. Features an adjustable cushioned headrest, 2-way adjustable cantilever-style arms and height-adjustable seat.

title: Eden
description: The Dressing Table is made of durable Veneered Engineered Wood that lasts longer and better withstands wear and tear, 600-pound weight limit.Frame & Floor Touch Material: Solid Mahogany Wood.

title: Arcadia
description: A regional unit of Greece in the central and southeastern Peloponnese. Tripoli, Greece is the capital and main city with a population over 47,000.

title: Sofa Fusion-302
description: Made from Kiln-dried imported Beech wood and veneered engineered wood.High quality environment friendly Polyurethane (PU) Lacquer in antique finis.Imported fabric upholstery with soft and durable cushioning.Fabric can be selected from available options.
